description:
Kids don’t let winter get in the way of their fun. From chilly playgrounds to downright freezing days in the mountains, the Lars winter coat will keep your little one toasty. By putting multiple layers of weather protection between kids and the elements, this jacket seals out winter’s worst moods. A recycled waterproof breathable shell keeps precipitation right where it should be. While recycled synthetic insulation and a soft fleece lining wraps them in quilt-like warmth.

  • Recycled polyester shell has a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Recycled polyester insulation holds onto warm air, is light and packable, and even stay warm when wet
  • Warm recycled polyester fleece lining feels great and wicks away moisture
  • BIONIC-FINISH®ECO fluorocarbon-free water and dirt repellent finish helps keep kids clean and dry
  • Full seam sealed construction adds even more weather protection
  • Removable insulated hood is there in lieu of a toque, or to add to a toques warmth
  • Hand pockets and a secure zippered chest pocket keep must-haves close
  • Internal name label takes some confusion out of the coat room
  • Reflective details help keep your little one seen
  • Wheat rates the Johan jacket to -25°C
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Wheat Winter Coat Lars - Children
